attributes.action: treat women who retire at 60 to same tax allowance as men who retire at 65
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Women who retire as OAP's at 60 lost out when the 10p tax was removed as men over 65 get higher tax allowances. Woman (OAP's) receive much lower allowances thereby pay more tax on pensions under £10,000.00 and are classed as low earners under 65 for tax purposes and this anomalie still continues despite Government assurances last November that it would be put right.
